LocationTrustMeasure.name: LocationTrustMeasure
LocationTrustMeasure.description: Represents the COVID safety protocols that your business follows. For example, enforcement of masks, social distancing, cleanliness, and capacity limits.

Description.description: A brief description of the safety protocol. For example, “Employees and customers are required to wear a mask in the store.”

IconUrl.description: A public image URL to display for the LocationTrustMeasure object.

IsVisibleInPublic.description: If true, displays the LocationTrustMeasure object on your site. If false, hides the LocationTrustMeasure object on your site.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date on which the record was last viewed.

LocationExternalReference.description: An ID assigned to the LocationTrustMeasure objects for a particular location.

LocationId.description: The unique ID for the location associated with the LocationTrustMeasure.

Name.description: An auto-assigned name for the LocationTrustMeasure.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner for this record.

SortOrder.description: The order in which to display LocationTrustMeasure objects on your site.

Title.description: The name of the safety protocol. For example, Enforcement of Masks.
